Translations.Text: illa rahmetem mir rabbik. inne fadlehu kane `aleyke kebira
kul leini-cteme`ati-l'insu velcinnu `ala ey ye'tu bimisli haze-lkur'ani la ye'tune bimislihi velev kane ba`duhum liba`din zahira
velekad sarrafna linnasi fi haze-lkur'ani min kulli mesel. feeba ekseru-nnasi illa kufura
vekalu len nu'mine leke hatta tefcura lena mine-l'ardi yembu`a
ev tekune leke cennetum min nehiliv ve`inebin fetufeccira-l'enhara hilaleha tefcira
ev tuskita-ssemae kema za`amte `aleyna kisefen ev te'tiye billahi velmelaiketi kabila
ev yekune leke beytum min zuhrufin ev terka fi-ssema'. velen nu'mine lirukiyyike hatta tunezzile `aleyna kitaben nakrauh. kul subhane rabbi hel kuntu illa beserar rasula
vema mene`a-nnase ey yu'minu iz caehumu-lhuda illa en kalu ebe`ase-llahu beserar rasula
kul lev kane fi-l'ardi melaiketuy yemsune mutmeinnine lenezzelna `aleyhim mine-ssemai meleker rasula
kul kefa billahi sehidem beyni vebeynekum. innehu kane bi`ibadihi habiram besira
